casebody.data:
Louisa SMITH, petitioner
v.
UNITED STATES DISTRICT COURT FOR THE SOUTHERN DISTRICT OF NEW YORK, et al. No. 13-1443. Supreme Court of the United States Oct. 6, 2014.

Opinion

The petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit denied. Justice SOTOMAYOR took no part in the consideration or decision of this petition.
